
```{python}
mpg = mpg = pd.read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/byuidatascience/data4python4ds/master/data-raw/mpg/mpg.csv")

```



```{python}
print(mpg

```

```{python}

chart = (alt.Chart(mpg)

)
```
